alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 29 at 3:09PM EDT until April 30 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 11 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In New York, Rensselaer, Eastern Columbia and Southern Washington Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...From 3 PM to 11 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
